representation_information.name: ITU-T (CCITT) T.6. Facsimile Coding Schemes and Coding Control Functions for Group 4 Facsimile Apparatus.Group 4 Compression (common name)
representation_information.description: Bitstream encoding format for still images that generally result from the scanning of paper documents. Offers lossless compression of bitonal (aka bi-level) images. Developed to support the international use of FAX machines, i.e., the 'Group 4 facsimile apparatus' for which T.6 images are encoded.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
